edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.pedersenCommittedValue
Class SigmaPedersenCommittedValueVerifierComputation

java.lang.Object
  edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.pedersenCommittedValue.SigmaPedersenCommittedValueVerifierComputation
All Implemented Interfaces:
DlogBasedSigma, SigmaVerifierComputation
public class SigmaPedersenCommittedValueVerifierComputation
extends java.lang.Object
implements SigmaVerifierComputation, DlogBasedSigma

Concrete implementation of Sigma Protocol verifier computation.

This protocol is used for a committer to prove that the value committed to in the commitment (h, c) is x.

The pseudo code of this protocol can be found in Protocol 1.5 of pseudo codes document at http://crypto.biu.ac.il/scapi/SDK_Pseudocode_SCAPI_V2.0.0.pdf.

Author:
Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
